tool_description: Fast, reliable language identification API. Detects 164 languages. Supports short & long texts, batch requests.
name: Language Detection
title: Language Detection

api_list.name: Detect Batch
api_list.description: Detect languages of multiple texts at once
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-language-detection.p.rapidapi.com/detect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-language-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
